forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The evening in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a soft veil of partly cloudy skies, with temperatures settling around a mild 51 degrees. The gentle west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets, carrying with it the promise of transitional weather. As night deepens, the city’s sporadic lights glimmer like stars at sea, yet the horizon suggests a lingering satin of fog, mysteriously cloaking the iconic Golden Gate. 

Tomorrow beckons brighter, with the sun stretching its golden rays across the sky, teasing the day with mostly clear conditions. Expect highs approaching the comfortable mid-60s as the warmth gradually replaces the coolness of the night. Clarity will sweep in, illuminating the rich architecture and rugged landscapes that make this city so beloved. Dressing in layers will serve you well, beginning with a light jacket to ward off the evening chill, transforming to simpler attire as the sun ascends. This is a day woven for quiet pleasures—perhaps a leisurely stroll along Market Street, caught in the rhythm of downtown life, or the simple joy of a coffee shared at a corner café, where you might observe the city waking up from its slumber.
